mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipes (title, cuisine_id, image, description, ingredients, steps, user_id, status, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{cuisineId}, #{image}, #{description}, #{ingredients}, #{steps}, #{userId}, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.title, r.cuisine_id, r.image, r.description, r.ingredients, r.steps, r.created_at, u.username as authorName, u.avatar_file_name as authorAvatar FROM recipes r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.status = 1 ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
